label: 正倉院
本: Exhibition of Shōsō-in Treasures , The 52nd  . Nara National Museum . 2000
説明文: Originally, the enclosed ground in which any shōsō (repository) was located. Today, however, all shōsō-in have disappeared except that of the temple Tōdai-ji, in Nara, so the name has come to refer exclusively to the Shōsō-in of Tōdai-ji. [東大寺]
